info:identity.info:name: com.ibm.streamsx.elasticsearch
info:identity.info:description:
The Elasticsearch toolkit is an open source IBM Streams toolkit that provides adapters for the [https://www.elastic.co/products/elasticsearch|Elasticsearch] search and analytics engine.
It provides the operators * `ElasticsearchIndex` to store tuple data as JSON documents in Elasticsearch indices
The toolkit supports the following features * Streams application configuration * Connecting to multiple Elasticsearch nodes in a cluster * Consistent region features to achieve at-least-once semantic where appropriate * Using SSL/TLS with HTTP Basic authentication to connect to servers
